MetaData.Context:
URL: http://www.debate.org/debates/Why-should-we-vote-for-Trump/1/
Crawl date: 2016/09/29 03:07:55
Debate: Why should we vote for Trump | Debate.org
Number of arguments: 2


Evidence Pro: I am personally not americian, I'm from New Zealand but I wanted to do a speech on why we should vote for trump, so please give me your opinion.

Evidence Con: My opponent says that, " I wanted to do a speech on why we should vote for trump, so please give me your opinion." I am Con, so I have to argue that we should not vote for Trump. My opponent has to affirm that we should vote for Trump. I do not need to give a reason why we should vote for Trump, because it is in my opponent's side, and it doesn't have to do with my burden, only making my burden negative. So I will give my opinion, and reason on why we should not vote Trump, because that is my burden. With that, challenge accepted. Ready to get goin*
MetaData.Title: Why should we vote for Trump

Premise: I am personally not americian, I'm from New Zealand but I wanted to do a speech on why we should vote for trump, so please give me your opinion.
Argument.Conclusion: Why should we vote for Trump

Premise: My opponent says that, " I wanted to do a speech on why we should vote for trump, so please give me your opinion." I am Con, so I have to argue that we should not vote for Trump. My opponent has to affirm that we should vote for Trump. I do not need to give a reason why we should vote for Trump, because it is in my opponent's side, and it doesn't have to do with my burden, only making my burden negative. So I will give my opinion, and reason on why we should not vote Trump, because that is my burden. With that, challenge accepted. Ready to get goin*
Argument.Conclusion: Why should we vote for Trump
